markdownRemark.html:
Gatsby new project Gatsby develop Gatsby run build // you have your local server

To Host on Github pages:

  1. Create a new github repo //eg. with name = /my_blog
  2. Add the following in gatsby-config.js module.exports = { pathPrefix: "/my_blog", }
  3. Add the following in the package.json { "scripts": { "deploy": "gatsby build --prefix-paths && gh-pages -d public" } }

Back on terminal: npm install gh-pages --save-dev git init git add . git commit -m "first commit"

git remote add origin git push git run deploy

frontmatter.title: How to deploy the Gatsby site to Github pages
